scenes.action_text: BAD TEACHER Written by Lee Eisenberg & Gene Stupnitsky June 6, 2008 FADE IN: EXT. JOHN ADAMS MIDDLE SCHOOL - DAY To establish. A school marquee with removable plastic letters reads, "GOOD LUCK WITH FINALS!" A JANITOR opens the glass and starts removing the letters. INT. TEACHER'S LOUNGE - DAY POP! A Champagne cork hits the ceiling. TEACHERS who rarely get to drink at work, jockey for po
